name: Yancheng
personal background:
<Yancheng Yuan is an Assistant Professor at The Hong Kong Polytechnic University since July 01, 2024. He was a Research Fellow in School of Computing, National University of Singapore from 2015 to 2018. Yuan obtained his PhD in Mathematics from Department of Mathematics, National University of Singapore in 2020, where he was supervised by . He also worked as a research fellow and received a Bachelor’s degree in Computational Mathematics from University of Science and Technology of China (USTC) in 2015, where he was supervised by > <Yancheng Yuan is a researcher with various publications in the field of optimization and machine learning. Some of his notable works include:

- Semismooth Newton Based Algorithm for Convex Clustering
- LAMBDA: A Large Model Based Data Agent
- SIOPT: An Efficient Sieving based Secant Method for Sparse Optimization Problems with Least-squares Constraints

His research interests are in optimization, machine learning, and data science. He has worked with various co-authors, including Defeng Sun, Kim-Chuan Toh, Xingwu Sun, Jiancan Wu, and others.> <Researchers Background>
